segments.text: Hey Matt . I'm going to ask Martha to marry me ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Really ? When did you decide this ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I always knew she was the one , but I decided to pop the big question about 2 weeks ago . I'm just debating on how to do it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You shouldn't use my example . It wasn't special . I kind of wish I made it more special but it's too late now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What do you think I should do ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There are a lot of options . You can surprise her over dinner , or ask her in a public area , or if you have the balls , ask her father in front of her .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Asking her father in front of her . How do you think she will react ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't know . You should know how she's going to react . She is your girlfriend .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think that's the idea I was looking for . Thanks , man .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't mention it . Good luck . You're going to need it .
segments.speaker: S1
